scripts.start:ctrl: cd apps/controller && node server.js & sleep 2 && npx open-cli http://localhost:3000
scripts.angular-light: cd apps/angular-test-light && npx ng serve --port 4201 --open false
scripts.angular-heavy: cd apps/angular-test-heavy && npx ng serve --port 4202 --open false
scripts.angular-light2: cd apps/angular-test-light && npx ng serve --port 4201 --host 0.0.0.0 --open false
scripts.angular-heavy2: cd apps/angular-test-heavy && npx ng serve --port 4202 --host 0.0.0.0 --open false
scripts.react-test: concurrently -n "CTRL,R-L,R-H" -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run start:ctrl" "npm run react-light" "npm run react-heavy"
scripts.start:all: npm run clean && concurrently -k -n "CTRL,A-L,A-H,R-L,R-H,VUE-L,VUE-H,SVE-L,SVE-H" -c "magenta,red,orange,cyan,blue,green,emerald,gold,ivory" "npm run start:ctrl" "npm run angular-light" "npm run angular-heavy" "npm run react-light" "npm run react-heavy" "npm run vue-light" "npm run vue-heavy" "npm run svelte-light" "npm run svelte-heavy"
scripts.start:docker-all: npm run clean && concurrently -k -n "CTRL,A-L,A-H,R-L,R-H,VUE-L,VUE-H,SVE-L,SVE-H" -c "magenta,red,orange,cyan,blue,green,emerald,gold,ivory" "npm run start:ctrl4docker" "npm run angular-light2" "npm run angular-heavy2" "npm run react-light2" "npm run react-heavy2" "npm run vue-light2" "npm run vue-heavy2" "npm run svelte-light2" "npm run svelte-heavy2"
